mapper.select:
select
distinct
from ims_ewei_shop_goods
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT sg.merchid merchId,sg.eng_title engTitle, sg.id goodsId, sg.title, sg.thumb_url thumbUrl, sg.productprice, sg.marketprice, sg.total, sg.services, ag.activity_id activityId, ag.begin_time beginTime, ag.end_time endTime, ac.begin_time startTime, sg.extra_discount discount,sg.discounts superDiscount, mer.star_level starLevel, ac.cashback_max cashbackMax,sg.costprice,sg.presellprice,sg.zero_costprice zeroCostprice,sg.zero_presellprice zeroPresellprice FROM ims_ewei_shop_goods sg INNER JOIN ims_ewei_shop_merch_user as mer on mer.id = sg.merchid INNER JOIN ims_ewei_shop_activity_goods ag ON sg.id = ag.goods_id INNER JOIN ims_ewei_shop_activity_config ac ON ag.activity_id = ac.activity_id AND ag.merch_id = ac.merch_id where sg.id = #{id}

select
from ims_ewei_shop_goods where id = #{id} for update
